channel.title: Please help! please reply!
channel.description: I Have matrix, and i want to play with my friend, i have port forwarded the correct port, and the server does work for ME with my ip, and i have created a no ip, and changed the ip in the client to mine, But when i give the client to my friend he gets the error_game_js5connect error, We have been trying for weeks to get this to work, but nothing is working, I Have given him the cache from User folder SO Say my name on my computer is adam, the folder would be Adam/Documents. the file is matrixcache, is this the file im supposed to give him? we tryed everything, even hamachi nothing works PLEASE HELP!!!! Will even offer a reward if i have to!. please!
